item.title: Filmes Preferidos
item.description:
Meu top 10, por enquanto:

  1. Interestelar, de Christopher Nolan
  2. La Grande Belleza, de Paolo Sorrentino
  3. The Wind Rises, do Studio Ghibli
  4. Vivre Sa Vie, de Jean-Luc Godard
  5. Vertigo, de Alfred Hitchcock
  6. My Darling Clementine, de John Ford
  7. After The Rain, de Takashi Koizumi
  8. Another Round, de Thomas Vinterberg
  9. A Hidden Life, de Terrence Malick
  10. Seven Samurai, de Akira Kurosawa

Gosto também:

  • Casablanca, de Michael Curtiz
  • Gertrud, de Carl Dreyer
  • Bunny Drop, de SABU
  • The Hunt, de Thomas Vinterberg
  • The Last Ronin, de Shigemichi Sugita
  • Love and Honor, de Yoji Yamada
  • Dirty Harry, de Don Siegel
  • Pickpocket, de Robert Bresson
